alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Trumbull and northwestern Mahoning Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 402 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinsman to 6 miles southwest of Newton Falls. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Warren, Niles, Hubbard, Cortland, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Kinsman, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Leavittsburg, Girard, Vienna, McDonald, Mecca, Johnston, Craig Beach, Orangeville, Yankee Lake, Churchill and Howland Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
